Class PinBall

java.lang.Object
  CircleObject
      PinBall

public class PinBall
extends CircleObject

CircleObject is the superclass for PinBall. PinBall has a score and two different characteristics as additional properties.

Version:
(0.4)
Author:
(UP826133)

Constructor Detail

PinBall

public PinBall(int xPos,
               int yPos,
               int xVel,
               int yVel,
               java.awt.Color objectColor,
               int objectRadius,
               Machine theMachine,
               int property1,
               int property2)
Constructor for objects of class PinBall

Parameters:
xPos - the horizontal coordinate of the object
yPos - the vertical coordinate of the object
xVel - the horizontal speed of the object
yVel - the vertical speed of the object
objectRadius - the radius (in pixels) of the object
objectColor - the color of the object
theMachine - the machine this object is in
property1 - the property when it bounces to a bumper
property2 - the property when it bounces to other pinball
